messages.message:
I am able to track original file inputs in this upload, there is a 584 page PDF - which collectively with other documents in upload is around 800 pages ad that is leading to OCR timeouts.
There is a task we have with tuning the client side timeouts for Form recognizer, which would help address this bottleneck. (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/DR-3397)

We are looking to push this into 24.14 - I will keep you posted as this goes in.,.
Does it cause all to fail if one fails?
Not all of them were that long
It very much seems all or nothing with flow
Once there is congestion it can equally affect short or long docs at that time in system. The tuning change will help manage until scaling up kicks in.
